Welcome to Auto Investments, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges.
We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality.

Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

attributes.description:
Please visit our website for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice.
This compact executive car is exceptionally clean and mechanically sound. She is reliable and great value for Money. Features include Leather seats, sunroof Cruise Control, Air con, Mag wheels and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches, and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)

attributes.description: All cars are mechanically checked and Dekra certified. Test Drives are available and welcome subject to availability. Nationwide deliveries can be arranged. We buy and will trade-in your car. On floor finance and insurance manager (NCA & FSB approved). Balance of factory warranty and/or comprehensive warranties available. Balance of motorplan on vehicles which qualify. Finance available through the majority of the financial institutions. With over 65 years of managerial retail experience we are here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery.
